pos review: Very comfortable, relaxed, great price, great location, nice breakfast with plenty of variety. Would definitely stay again
Placement of the hotel. Quiet during the night
neg review: Insulation around the door of the chamber missing.

pos review: Friendly reception. Breakfast was very good. WiFi was good.
neg review: Cleanliness in the room was at the time of my visit not OK. Bedlight not working, garbage bin not working. 2nd pillow not fresh at all. First night very calm, second night very noisy outside.

pos review: If there ever was a problem. The staff tried it's very best to sort it out. I was there during graspop metal meeting.
Staff were helpful, room was clean and comfortable, breakfast was excellent

neg review: On the 6th floor there was constantly a hard "clicking" sound. That becomes from the box near the elevator door. Very irritating..

pos review: Location is great, right in town next to the Police station. The staff are excellent and very accommodating.
neg review: I was given a very small room to begin with but after I asked for an upgrade was given a suite which was great.
